      • getFileTypeByFileName

        public FileType getFileTypeByFileName(java.lang.String fileName)
        Description copied from class: FileTypeRegistry
        Same as FileTypeRegistry.getFileTypeByFileName(CharSequence) but receives String parameter. Consider to use the method above in case when you want to get VirtualFile's file type by file name.
        Specified by:
        getFileTypeByFileName in class FileTypeRegistry

      • getFileTypeByFile

        public FileType getFileTypeByFile(VirtualFile file)
        Description copied from class: FileTypeRegistry
        Returns the file type for the specified file.
        Specified by:
        getFileTypeByFile in class FileTypeRegistry
        Parameters:
        file - The file for which the type is requested.
        Returns:
        The file type instance.

      • getFileTypeByExtension

        public FileType getFileTypeByExtension(java.lang.String extension)
        Description copied from class: FileTypeRegistry
        Returns the file type for the specified extension. Note that a more general way of obtaining file type is with FileTypeRegistry.getFileTypeByFile(VirtualFile)
        Specified by:
        getFileTypeByExtension in class FileTypeRegistry
        Parameters:
        extension - The extension for which the file type is requested, not including the leading '.'.
        Returns:
        The file type instance, or UnknownFileType.INSTANCE if corresponding file type not found

      • getRegisteredFileTypes

        public FileType [] getRegisteredFileTypes()
        Description copied from class: FileTypeRegistry
        Returns the list of all registered file types.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        The list of file types.

      • isFileIgnored

        public boolean isFileIgnored(java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from class: FileTypeManager
        Checks if the specified file is ignored by the IDE. Ignored files are not visible in different project views and cannot be opened in the editor. They will neither be parsed nor compiled.
        Specified by:
        isFileIgnored in class FileTypeManager
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the file to check.
        Returns:
        true if the file is ignored, false otherwise.

      • isFileIgnored

        Specified by:
        isFileIgnored in class FileTypeRegistry

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
